summary: TAKATA RECALL:  I TOOK MY 2011 FORD RANGER TO KIRK BROTHERS FORD IN GREENWOOD, MS TO ARRANGE TO HAVE THE AIR BAG (S) REPAIRED.  I WAS TOLD THE RECALL WAS FOR THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG AND THAT THE PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE.  THE COULD NOT GIVE ME AN ESTIMATE OF WHEN THE PARTS WILL BE AVAILABLE.  THIS INFORMATION DID NOT GIVE ME A WARM FUZZY FEELING.  DO YOU HAVE A SUGGESTION FOR HOW I CAN GET THIS MATTER RESOLVED?  THANK YOU.
